attributes.contentHtml:
ExoHost actually new name ViaHost is coming back wtf RN BadSK gpot his 5th account disabled and now he is doing it all again starting viahost back

Hello again,

This completely needs to stop.

You may have heard of Bad. he was the owner of ViaHost (the most worst host i could say - with no terms of service, private policy and not even in a GPDR comp). As when Via shut down, a new host appeared it was ExoHost, and still again running services for users with no GPDR. He bans every user that complains about not tos, pp and gpdr so people wouldn't notice as much. Here is Bad saying that he does not care about legal policies / documents to host
+ http://prntscr.com/ve8sgg +
And here is link for if you cannot see the image: http://prntscr.com/ve8qpk . Bad has already been winterhoax'd and has been on summerhoax too until it became offline. People complain about Bad and some people think he is a nice person, and for the people who think he is, here is my evidence of him being the worst person:

Investigation & At the server

I had friends that are staff on Exo (bad's new host) to investigate. They are being nice to the guild to gain some trust. While at the guild, our team gathered some screenshots and evidence of him trying to scam, lie and destroy/raid hosts so users can come to their host until it releases. Just so you know they still fricking beg for VPS wtf

I am COO Management at HeikNodes

Now on to the proof:
Credit to Tomas:

Credit to BobKabab:
Hm? Trying to get Heik down for them to win (exo)


Even SaintyBoy was part of it??? http://prntscr.com/ve904d
Credit to Tomas:


Thinking they'd win ;)



Here's my friend pretending that he is on the Exo side to gain trust;

Here's proof of Bad admitting it


Lmao what a funny status, no?

HERE IS BAD THREATENING ME LMFAO TO LEAK EVERYTHING I GOT


Still don't get it?

Oh yea forgot to mention they figured out how to get freenom domains and they use no SSL not even forced on their transaction site
You may reply to this if you want to know the start of how this happend..
